$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for IDE validation.

version.description: Semantic version of this config schema (MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH).

paths.description: Relative paths (from repo root) to speckit directories.

memory.description: Directory containing constitution.md and other governance files.

scripts.description: Directory containing bash helper scripts (common.sh, check-prerequisites.sh, etc.).

templates.description: Directory containing spec, plan, tasks, and checklist templates.

specs.description: Directory for feature specifications and planning artifacts (spec.md, plan.md, tasks.md, etc.).

features.description: Optional feature flags for advanced workflows.

dualRepo.description: When true, the project uses a public + private (internal/) dual-repository layout.

internalSubmodule.description: Relative path to the internal/private submodule (relevant when dualRepo is true).
